title: Yin Yoga Recovery - Upper Body & Hips
notes: Block 5 Week 2: Yin Yoga recovery session focused on releasing tension from Monday (chest/triceps) and Tuesday (back/biceps) training. Long-hold passive stretches (3-5 min each) for deep fascia release. Target: chest, shoulders, lats, hip flexors, hamstrings.

items.name: Child's Pose with Deep Breathing
items.notes: 3 min. Settle into the practice, focus on breath (4-6-4 rhythm)

items.name: Cat-Cow to Cobra Stretch
items.notes: 8 rounds. Gentle spine mobility to prepare for deeper stretches

items.name: Sphinx Pose (Chest & Shoulders)
items.notes: 4 min. Passive chest opener after Monday pressing. Forearms on ground, gentle backbend

items.name: Thread the Needle (Shoulders & Upper Back)
items.notes: 3 min per side. Release shoulders and upper back from rows and pull-ups

items.name: Reclined Twist (Chest & Lats)
items.notes: 4 min per side. Deep chest and lat release. Knees to one side, arms in T-position

items.name: Supported Fish Pose (Chest Opener)
items.notes: 5 min. Block or bolster under upper back. Deep chest, shoulder, neck release

items.name: Dragon Pose (Hip Flexors & Quads)
items.notes: 4 min per side. Deep hip flexor release after basketball and training. Low lunge variation

items.name: Sleeping Swan / Pigeon Pose (Glutes & Hips)
items.notes: 5 min per side. Deep glute and hip release. Fold forward over bent front leg

items.name: Caterpillar Pose (Hamstrings & Spine)
items.notes: 5 min. Seated forward fold. Let spine round naturally, release hamstrings and lower back

items.name: Supine Twist (Full Spine)
items.notes: 4 min per side. Gentle spinal twist for full-body integration

items.name: Butterfly Pose (Seated Forward Fold)
items.notes: 4 min. Inner thigh and hip release. Fold forward gently, let gravity do the work

items.name: Legs-Up-the-Wall
items.notes: 5 min. Inversion for circulation, calming nervous system. Optional bolster under hips

items.name: Savasana (Final Relaxation)
items.notes: 5 min. Complete relaxation. Focus on breath, body scan, let all tension release
